name: 1000 Lightyears in the Void of Space
name_original: 1000 Lightyears in the Void of Space
description:
Spaceliner SMS Kurma has been in the Oshan Star System for too long hunting for the powerful energy ore XDC2. But the Captain’s hidden agenda put the lives of each and every crew member in jeopardy. And now you are stuck 

In this first person escape room space adventure, you find yourself abandoned and alone on a deep-space mining vessel. Navigate the interior of the spaceship. Interact with various objects. Solve puzzles to gain access. And find a way to power the door to make your escape. But you better heed those proximity warnings. 1000 meters may seem like a long way off, but in the darkness of space, you never know when the monster can pounce!  

Credits:

aprzn123 / Music


We used some assets from PolygonSciFiSpace pack.
